He aligned it with North Star & kept clicking photos every 12 seconds for next three hours.   Camera is looking at the same portion of the Milky Way & hence it appears stationary. Movement of the Earth is so beautifully felt. 2/2

We know that Earth rotates on its Axis & revolves around the Sun. But we can't feel it at all.   But here Aryeh Nirenberg an astrophotographer has clicked exceptionally beautiful video, where in we can feel the rotation of the Earth.
